@charset "UTF-8";
@import url(https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Source+Code+Pro:300,400,600,900|Oswald:700);
html {
  box-sizing: border-box; }

*, *::after, *::before {
  box-sizing: inherit; }

/*! normalize.css http://github.com/necolas/normalize.css */
/* =============================================================================
   HTML5 display definitions
   ========================================================================== */
/*
 * Corrects block display not defined in IE6/7/8/9 & FF3
 */
article,
aside,
details,
figcaption,
figure,
footer,
header,
hgroup,
nav,
section,
summary {
  display: block; }

/*
 * Corrects inline-block display not defined in IE6/7/8/9 & FF3
 */
audio,
canvas,
video {
  display: inline-block;
  *display: inline;
  *zoom: 1; }

/*
 * Prevents modern browsers from displaying 'audio' without controls
 */
audio:not([controls]) {
  display: none; }

/*
 * Addresses styling for 'hidden' attribute not present in IE7/8/9, FF3, S4
 * Known issue: no IE6 support
 */
[hidden] {
  display: none; }

/* =============================================================================
   Base
   ========================================================================== */
/*
 * 1. Corrects text resizing oddly in IE6/7 when body font-size is set using em units
 *  http://clagnut.com/blog/348/#c790
 * 2. Prevents iOS text size adjust after orientation change, without disabling user zoom
 *  www.456bereastreet.com/archive/201012/controlling_text_size_in_safari_for_ios_without_disabling_user_zoom/
 */
html {
  font-size: 100%;
  /* 1 */
  -webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;
  /* 2 */
  -ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;
  /* 2 */ }

/*
 * Addresses font-family inconsistency between 'textarea' and other form elements.
 */
html,
button,
input,
select,
textarea {
  font-family: sans-serif; }

/*
 * Addresses margins handled incorrectly in IE6/7
 */
body {
  margin: 0; }

/* =============================================================================
   Links
   ========================================================================== */
/*
 * Addresses outline displayed oddly in Chrome
 */
a:focus {
  outline: thin dotted; }

/*
 * Improves readability when focused and also mouse hovered in all browsers
 * people.opera.com/patrickl/experiments/keyboard/test
 */
a:hover,
a:active {
  outline: 0; }

/* =============================================================================
   Typography
   ========================================================================== */
/*
 * Addresses font sizes and margins set differently in IE6/7
 * Addresses font sizes within 'section' and 'article' in FF4+, Chrome, S5
 */
h1 {
  font-size: 2em;
  margin: 0; }

h2 {
  font-size: 1.5em;
  margin: 0; }

h3 {
  font-size: 1.17em;
  margin: 0; }

h4 {
  font-size: 1em;
  margin: 0; }

h5 {
  font-size: 0.83em;
  margin: 0; }

h6 {
  font-size: 0.75em;
  margin: 0; }

/*
 * Addresses styling not present in IE7/8/9, S5, Chrome
 */
abbr[title] {
  border-bottom: 1px dotted; }

/*
 * Addresses style set to 'bolder' in FF3+, S4/5, Chrome
*/
b,
strong {
  font-weight: bold; }

blockquote {
  margin: 1em 40px; }

/*
 * Addresses styling not present in S5, Chrome
 */
dfn {
  font-style: italic; }

/*
 * Addresses styling not present in IE6/7/8/9
 */
mark {
  background: #ff0;
  color: #000; }

/*
 * Addresses margins set differently in IE6/7
 */
p,
pre {
  margin: 1em 0; }

/*
 * Corrects font family set oddly in IE6, S4/5, Chrome
 * en.wikipedia.org/wiki/User:Davidgothberg/Test59
 */
pre,
code,
kbd,
samp {
  font-family: monospace, serif;
  _font-family: 'courier new', monospace;
  font-size: 1em; }

/*
 * Improves readability of pre-formatted text in all browsers
 */
pre {
  white-space: pre;
  white-space: pre-wrap;
  word-wrap: break-word; }

/*
 * 1. Addresses CSS quotes not supported in IE6/7
 * 2. Addresses quote property not supported in S4
 */
/* 1 */
q {
  quotes: none; }

/* 2 */
q:before,
q:after {
  content: '';
  content: none; }

small {
  font-size: 75%; }

/*
 * Prevents sub and sup affecting line-height in all browsers
 * gist.github.com/413930
 */
sub,
sup {
  font-size: 75%;
  line-height: 0;
  position: relative;
  vertical-align: baseline; }

sup {
  top: -0.5em; }

sub {
  bottom: -0.25em; }

/* =============================================================================
   Lists
   ========================================================================== */
/*
 * Addresses margins set differently in IE6/7
 */
dl,
menu,
ol,
ul {
  margin: 1em 0; }

dd {
  margin: 0 0 0 40px; }

/*
 * Addresses paddings set differently in IE6/7
 */
menu,
ol,
ul {
  padding: 0 0 0 40px; }

/*
 * Corrects list images handled incorrectly in IE7
 */
nav ul,
nav ol {
  list-style: none;
  list-style-image: none; }

/* =============================================================================
   Embedded content
   ========================================================================== */
/*
 * 1. Removes border when inside 'a' element in IE6/7/8/9, FF3
 * 2. Improves image quality when scaled in IE7
 *  code.flickr.com/blog/2008/11/12/on-ui-quality-the-little-things-client-side-image-resizing/
 */
img {
  border: 0;
  /* 1 */
  -ms-interpolation-mode: bicubic;
  /* 2 */ }

/*
 * Corrects overflow displayed oddly in IE9
 */
svg:not(:root) {
  overflow: hidden; }

/* =============================================================================
   Figures
   ========================================================================== */
/*
 * Addresses margin not present in IE6/7/8/9, S5, O11
 */
figure {
  margin: 0; }

/* =============================================================================
   Forms
   ========================================================================== */
/*
 * Corrects margin displayed oddly in IE6/7
 */
form {
  margin: 0; }

/*
 * Define consistent border, margin, and padding
 */
fieldset {
  border: 1px solid #c0c0c0;
  margin: 0 2px;
  padding: 0.35em 0.625em 0.75em; }

/*
 * 1. Corrects color not being inherited in IE6/7/8/9
 * 2. Corrects text not wrapping in FF3 
 * 3. Corrects alignment displayed oddly in IE6/7
 */
legend {
  border: 0;
  /* 1 */
  padding: 0;
  white-space: normal;
  /* 2 */
  *margin-left: -7px;
  /* 3 */ }

/*
 * 1. Corrects font size not being inherited in all browsers
 * 2. Addresses margins set differently in IE6/7, FF3+, S5, Chrome
 * 3. Improves appearance and consistency in all browsers
 */
button,
input,
select,
textarea {
  font-size: 100%;
  /* 1 */
  margin: 0;
  /* 2 */
  vertical-align: baseline;
  /* 3 */
  *vertical-align: middle;
  /* 3 */ }

/*
 * Addresses FF3/4 setting line-height on 'input' using !important in the UA stylesheet
 */
button,
input {
  line-height: normal;
  /* 1 */ }

/*
 * 1. Improves usability and consistency of cursor style between image-type 'input' and others
 * 2. Corrects inability to style clickable 'input' types in iOS
 * 3. Removes inner spacing in IE7 without affecting normal text inputs
 *  Known issue: inner spacing remains in IE6
 */
button,
input[type="button"],
input[type="reset"],
input[type="submit"] {
  cursor: pointer;
  /* 1 */
  -webkit-appearance: button;
  /* 2 */
  *overflow: visible;
  /* 3 */ }

/*
 * Re-set default cursor for disabled elements
 */
button[disabled],
input[disabled] {
  cursor: default; }

/*
 * 1. Addresses box sizing set to content-box in IE8/9
 * 2. Removes excess padding in IE8/9
 * 3. Removes excess padding in IE7
    Known issue: excess padding remains in IE6
 */
input[type="checkbox"],
input[type="radio"] {
  box-sizing: border-box;
  /* 1 */
  padding: 0;
  /* 2 */
  *height: 13px;
  /* 3 */
  *width: 13px;
  /* 3 */ }

/*
 * 1. Addresses appearance set to searchfield in S5, Chrome
 * 2. Addresses box-sizing set to border-box in S5, Chrome (include -moz to future-proof)
 */
input[type="search"] {
  -webkit-appearance: textfield;
  /* 1 */
  -moz-box-sizing: content-box;
  -webkit-box-sizing: content-box;
  /* 2 */
  box-sizing: content-box; }

/*
 * Removes inner padding and search cancel button in S5, Chrome on OS X
 */
input[type="search"]::-webkit-search-decoration,
input[type="search"]::-webkit-search-cancel-button {
  -webkit-appearance: none; }

/*
 * Removes inner padding and border in FF3+
 * www.sitepen.com/blog/2008/05/14/the-devils-in-the-details-fixing-dojos-toolbar-buttons/
 */
button::-moz-focus-inner,
input::-moz-focus-inner {
  border: 0;
  padding: 0; }

/*
 * 1. Removes default vertical scrollbar in IE6/7/8/9
 * 2. Improves readability and alignment in all browsers
 */
textarea {
  overflow: auto;
  /* 1 */
  vertical-align: top;
  /* 2 */ }

/* =============================================================================
   Tables
   ========================================================================== */
/*
 * Remove most spacing between table cells
 */
table {
  border-collapse: collapse;
  border-spacing: 0; }

/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*  Config
/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
html {
  font-size: 62.5%; }

::selection {
  background: #ffdc00; }

::-moz-selection {
  background: #ffdc00; }

/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*  My reset
/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*
 * Remove the gap between audio, canvas, iframes,
 * images, videos and the bottom of their containers:
 * https://github.com/h5bp/html5-boilerplate/issues/440
 */
audio,
canvas,
iframe,
img,
svg,
video {
  vertical-align: middle; }

/*
 * Remove default fieldset styles.
 */
fieldset {
  border: 0;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0; }

/*
 * Allow only vertical resizing of textareas.
 */
textarea {
  resize: vertical; }

.hide, .mobile__hide {
  display: none;
  visibility: hidden; }

button {
  border: none;
  background: none;
  padding: 0; }

@media screen and (min-width: 900px) {
  .mobile__hide {
    display: block;
    visibility: visible; } }

@media screen and (min-width: 900px) {
  .desktop__hide {
    display: none !important;
    visibility: hidden !important; } }

/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*  Typography
/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
body {
  font-family: "Source Code Pro", serif;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-size: 1.4rem;
  line-height: 1.5;
  color: #2F2F2F; }

.logo {
  font-size: 14px;
  font-size: 1.4rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  position: absolute;
  top: 20px;
  left: 0; }
  .logo a {
    text-decoration: none;
    color: inherit; }
    .logo a:after {
      content: "";
      display: block;
      width: 10px;
      height: 20px;
      background: #ffdc00;
      float: left;
      margin: 0px 20px 0 0; }

.home .logo {
  display: none;
  visibility: hidden; }

.title {
  font-family: Oswald, sans-serif;
  font-weight: bold;
  font-size: 36px;
  font-size: 3.6rem;
  color: #2F2F2F;
  line-height: 1.1;
  margin-bottom: 25px; }
  .title a {
    text-decoration: none;
    color: inherit; }

.title__article {
  font-size: 24px;
  font-size: 2.4rem;
  margin-bottom: 10px; }

.title__article--small {
  font-size: 30px;
  font-size: 3rem;
  color: #000; }

.title__article--home {
  font-family: "Source Code Pro", serif;
  font-weight: 400;
  font-color: #000;
  font-size: 16px;
  font-size: 1.6rem;
  margin-bottom: 5px; }

.title__page {
  font-size: 36px;
  font-size: 3.6rem;
  color: #000;
  text-transform: uppercase; }

.title__page--home {
  font-size: 36px;
  font-size: 3.6rem;
  margin-bottom: 35px; }

.title__page--nav {
  margin-top: 70px;
  border-left: 15px solid #ffdc00;
  padding-left: 15px; }

.title__page--small {
  font-size: 18px;
  font-size: 1.8rem; }

.title__sidebar {
  font-size: 14px;
  font-size: 1.4rem;
  color: #bababa;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  letter-spacing: .2em;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
  font-family: "Source Code Pro", serif; }

.title__vertical, .home .title--actuhome {
  font-family: "Source Code Pro", serif;
  font-weight: 700;
  font-size: 18px;
  font-size: 1.8rem;
  color: #000;
  position: relative;
  margin-bottom: 25px; }
  .title__vertical:after, .home .title--actuhome:after {
    content: "";
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
    width: 15px;
    height: 7px;
    background: #ffdc00;
    bottom: 7px;
    left: -24px; }

.title__footer {
  font-family: "Source Code Pro", serif;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-size: 1.4rem;
  color: #000;
  text-transform: uppercase; }

.section__home {
  font-size: 16px;
  font-size: 1.6rem; }

.sidebar--student {
  position: relative;
  padding-top: 25px; }

.bio--classe {
  text-transform: uppercase;
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0; }

.copyright {
  font-size: 12px;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  display: block;
  text-align: center;
  padding: 0 5%;
  clear: both; }

.link {
  color: #000;
  font-weight: 900;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  padding: 0 3px;
  display: inline-block;
  position: relative;
  text-decoration: none;
  z-index: 1; }
  .link:before {
    content: "> "; }
  .link:after {
    content: "";
    width: 100%;
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    height: 40%;
    background: #ffdc00;
    z-index: -1;
    -webkit-transition: height 300ms cubic-bezier(0.19, 1, 0.22, 1);
    -moz-transition: height 300ms cubic-bezier(0.19, 1, 0.22, 1);
    transition: height 300ms cubic-bezier(0.19, 1, 0.22, 1); }
  .link:hover:after {
    height: 100%; }

.actuMore + .link {
  margin: 0 0 0 9.375%;
  position: relative;
  top: -40px; }

.btnmenu {
  color: #000;
  font-size: 16px;
  font-size: 1.6rem;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  position: fixed;
  top: 20px;
  right: 9.375%;
  padding: 0 3px;
  z-index: 100;
  font-family: "Source Code Pro", serif;
  font-weight: 900; }
  .btnmenu:before {
    content: "";
    width: 100%;
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    top: 0;
    height: 50%;
    background: #fafafa;
    z-index: -1; }
  .btnmenu:after {
    content: "";
    width: 100%;
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    height: 50%;
    background: #ffdc00;
    z-index: -1; }

p a {
  color: #000;
  display: inline-block;
  text-decoration: none;
  position: relative;
  font-weight: 700; }
  p a:before {
    content: "";
    width: 100%;
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    bottom: 10%;
    height: 20%;
    background: #ffdc00;
    z-index: -1;
    -webkit-transition: height 300ms cubic-bezier(0.19, 1, 0.22, 1);
    -moz-transition: height 300ms cubic-bezier(0.19, 1, 0.22, 1);
    transition: height 300ms cubic-bezier(0.19, 1, 0.22, 1); }
  p a:hover:before {
    height: 90%; }

h1 {
  font-size: 39; }

h2 {
  font-size: 31; }

h3 {
  font-size: 25; }

h4 {
  font-size: 25; }

h5 {
  font-size: 25; }

h6 {
  font-size: 25; }

.footer .copyright, .footer .copyright a {
  text-align: center;
  color: #9c9c9c;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 12px;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  padding: 0; }

.category .title__page--sidebar {
  position: relative; }
  .category .title__page--sidebar:before {
    content: "Sélection dans";
    position: absolute;
    top: -20px;
    font-size: 18px;
    font-size: 1.8rem;
    color: #bababa;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    font-family: "Source Code Pro", serif;
    font-weight: 600; }

.title__page--actu {
  position: absolute;
  top: 116px;
  left: 9.375%; }

.article__info {
  font-size: 12px;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  color: #9c9c9c;
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-bottom: 40px;
  display: block; }
  .article__info a {
    color: #505050;
    text-decoration: none; }

.article__content {
  line-height: 1.9; }
  .article__content img {
    max-width: 100%; }
  .article__content blockquote {
    font-style: italic;
    color: #666;
    border-left: 5px solid #ffdc00;
    margin: 0 0 60px 0;
    padding-left: 25px;
    font-size: 14px;
    font-size: 1.4rem;
    font-weight: 100; }

.more__term {
  position: relative; }
  .more__term:after {
    content: "";
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
    width: 90%;
    height: 23px;
    background: #ffdc00;
    bottom: 7px;
    left: -5px;
    z-index: -1; }

.sidebar--student .title__sidebar {
  padding-top: 15px; }

@media screen and (min-width: 640px) {
  .footer .copyright, .footer .copyright a {
    text-align: left; } }

@media screen and (min-width: 900px) {
  body {
    font-size: 16px;
    font-size: 1.6rem; }
  .logo {
    font-size: 17px;
    font-size: 1.7rem;
    position: static;
    float: left;
    line-height: 100px; }
    .logo a:after {
      width: 20px;
      margin: 40px 20px 0 0; }
  .title {
    font-size: 48px;
    font-size: 4.8rem; }
  .article__more h3.title {
    margin-left: 5%; }
  .title__article {
    font-size: 36px;
    font-size: 3.6rem; }
  .title__article--small {
    font-size: 30px;
    font-size: 3rem; }
  .title__article--home {
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 22px;
    font-size: 2.2rem; }
  .title__page {
    font-size: 60px;
    font-size: 6rem; }
  .article .title__page {
    position: relative;
    z-index: 5;
    width: 90%; }
  .title__page--home {
    font-size: 80px;
    font-size: 8rem;
    margin: 65px 0 45px 0;
    white-space: nowrap;
    position: relative;
    z-index: 5; }
  .title__page--sidebar {
    white-space: nowrap;
    position: absolute;
    top: 35px;
    left: 0;
    /*
			+ .sidebar__section {
				padding-top: 80px;
			}
*/ }
  .title__page--student {
    left: 240px;
    top: 70px; }
  .bio--classe {
    text-transform: uppercase;
    position: absolute;
    top: 45px;
    left: 240px; }
  .category .title__page--sidebar {
    top: 45px;
    position: absolute; }
  .title__page--small {
    font-size: 18px;
    font-size: 1.8rem;
    text-transform: uppercase; }
  .title__sidebar {
    font-size: 11px;
    font-size: 1.1rem; }
  .sidebar--student .title__sidebar {
    padding-top: 15px; }
  .sidebar--student p {
    width: 70%; }
  .title__page--actu {
    position: static;
    top: inherit;
    left: inherit; }
  .title__vertical {
    font-weight: 400;
    display: inline-block;
    font-size: 22px;
    font-size: 2.2rem;
    color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
    -webkit-transform: rotate(90deg);
    -moz-transform: rotate(90deg);
    -ms-transform: rotate(90deg);
    -o-transform: rotate(90deg);
    transform: rotate(90deg); }
  .home .title--actuhome {
    font-family: Oswald, sans-serif;
    font-weight: 700;
    font-size: 48px;
    font-size: 4.8rem; }
    .home .title--actuhome:after {
      content: none; }
  .title__vertical--light {
    color: #ededed; }
    .title__vertical--light:after {
      background: #ededed; }
  .btnrandom__projet {
    font-family: "Source Code Pro", serif;
    font-weight: 700;
    display: inline-block;
    font-size: 15px;
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    color: #c7c7c7;
    -webkit-transform: rotate(90deg);
    -moz-transform: rotate(90deg);
    -ms-transform: rotate(90deg);
    -o-transform: rotate(90deg);
    transform: rotate(90deg);
    position: absolute;
    z-index: 1;
    top: 127px;
    right: -60px; }
    .btnrandom__projet:after {
      content: "";
      width: 100%;
      display: block;
      position: absolute;
      left: 0;
      bottom: 0;
      height: 40%;
      background: #f0f0f0;
      z-index: -1; }
    .btnrandom__projet:before {
      content: "> "; }
  .title__footer {
    font-family: "Source Code Pro", serif;
    font-size: 14px;
    font-size: 1.4rem;
    color: #000;
    text-transform: uppercase; }
  .section__nouvelles .title__vertical {
    position: absolute;
    right: 14%;
    top: 90px; }
  .section__selection .title {
    white-space: nowrap; }
  .section__selection .title__vertical {
    position: absolute;
    left: 2%;
    transform-origin: 0 100%; }
  .footer .title__vertical {
    position: absolute;
    left: 2%;
    transform-origin: 0 100%; }
  .section__more .container {
    position: relative; }
  .section__more .title.textright {
    width: 300px;
    float: left;
    position: relative;
    top: 50px; }
  .section__more .more__bg {
    background: #fff;
    width: 70.833333333%;
    float: right;
    margin-right: 15%;
    padding: 60px 4.1666666667% 50px;
    -webkit-columns: 2 8em;
    -moz-columns: 2 8em;
    columns: 2 8em;
    -webkit-column-gap: 3.125em;
    -moz-column-gap: 3.125em;
    column-gap: 3.125em; }
    .section__more .more__bg:before {
      content: "";
      display: block;
      width: 410px;
      height: 240px;
      border: 5px solid #ececec;
      position: absolute;
      top: -15px;
      left: 2%;
      z-index: -1; }
    .section__more .more__bg p {
      margin: 0 0 20px 0; }
  .actuMore + .link {
    margin: 40px 0 0 47.833333333%;
    position: relative;
    top: inherit; }
    .actuMore + .link:after {
      content: none; }
  .article__content h3 {
    font-size: 30px;
    font-size: 3rem;
    color: #000;
    margin: 80px 0 40px;
    position: relative;
    z-index: 1;
    font-family: Oswald, sans-serif;
    font-weight: bold; }
    .article__content h3:after {
      content: "";
      display: block;
      width: 27px;
      height: 16px;
      background: #ffdc00;
      position: absolute;
      top: 65%;
      left: -12px;
      z-index: -1; }
  .article__content h4 {
    font-family: Oswald, sans-serif;
    font-weight: bold;
    font-size: 22px;
    font-size: 2.2rem; }
  .article__content blockquote {
    font-size: 17px;
    font-size: 1.7rem; }
  .article__content img {
    max-width: 138%;
    margin-left: -18.8%;
    margin-bottom: 30px; }
  .article__content p {
    margin-bottom: 2em; }
  .article__content a {
    color: #000;
    position: relative;
    text-decoration: none;
    z-index: 1; }
    .article__content a:after {
      content: "";
      width: 100%;
      display: block;
      position: absolute;
      left: 0;
      bottom: 0;
      height: 40%;
      background: #ffdc00;
      z-index: -1; }
  .article__content .article__info a:after {
    content: none; }
  .more__term:after {
    bottom: 7px; }
  .footer .copyright, .footer .copyright a {
    text-align: right;
    color: #9c9c9c;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 12px;
    font-size: 1.2rem;
    text-transform: uppercase; }
  .facebookLink {
    color: #fff;
    padding: 0 2px; }
    .facebookLink:before {
      background: #3b5998;
      bottom: 0%;
      height: 90%; }
  .twitterLink {
    color: #fff; }
    .twitterLink:before {
      background: #55acee;
      bottom: 0%;
      height: 90%; }
  .textright {
    text-align: right; }
  .textleft {
    text-align: left; }
  .sidebar__backlink {
    text-decoration: none;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    color: #9c9c9c;
    position: absolute;
    top: 15px;
    left: 0; }
    .sidebar__backlink:before {
      content: "< "; }
  .sidebar--big a {
    z-index: 1; } }

@media screen and (min-width: 1200px) {
  .section__selection .title__vertical, .footer .title__vertical {
    left: 0; }
  .section__more .more__bg:before {
    left: 0; } }

/*  Layout
/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
body {
  background: #fafafa; }

.container {
  padding: 60px 9.375% 0; }

.section {
  padding-bottom: 50px;
  margin-bottom: 50px; }

.section__nouvelles {
  padding-bottom: 0; }

.section__home {
  padding-top: 250px; }

.section__homeimage {
  height: 320px;
  width: 100%;
  position: absolute;
  left: 0;
  top: 0;
  background-size: cover;
  background-position: left top;
  z-index: -1; }
  .section__homeimage:after {
    content: "";
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
    width: 100%;
    height: 80%;
    left: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    /* Permalink - use to edit and share this gradient: http://colorzilla.com/gradient-editor/#fafafa+0,fafafa+100&0+0,0.7+64,1+98 */
    background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, rgba(250, 250, 250, 0) 0%, rgba(250, 250, 250, 0.7) 64%, #fafafa 98%, #fafafa 100%);
    /* FF3.6-15 */
    background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, rgba(250, 250, 250, 0) 0%, rgba(250, 250, 250, 0.7) 64%, #fafafa 98%, #fafafa 100%);
    /* Chrome10-25,Safari5.1-6 */
    background: linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(250, 250, 250, 0) 0%, rgba(250, 250, 250, 0.7) 64%, #fafafa 98%, #fafafa 100%);
    /* W3C, IE10+, FF16+, Chrome26+, Opera12+, Safari7+ */ }

.articlehome {
  background: #fff;
  padding-bottom: 50px; }

  height: 200px;
  background-size: cover;
  background-position: center top;
  width: 100%;
  margin-bottom: 60px; }

  position: relative;
  padding-top: 20px; }
  .articlehome__content .date {
    position: absolute;
    top: -30px;
    color: #9c9c9c;
    font-size: 12px;
    font-size: 1.2rem; }
    .articlehome__content .date:before {
      content: "- "; }

  margin: 70px 0 130px;
  text-align: center;

  font-style: italic;
  position: relative;
  padding: 10px 0; }

    margin: 0; }

    background-repeat: space;
    z-index: -1; }

    content: "";
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
    right: 0;
    top: 0;
    width: 50%;
    height: 100%;
    background: #fff;
    z-index: -1; }

  overflow: hidden; }

/*  List

.nav {
  position: fixed;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background: #fafafa;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  -webkit-transition: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.175, 0.885, 0.32, 1.275);
  -moz-transition: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.175, 0.885, 0.32, 1.275);
  transition: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.175, 0.885, 0.32, 1.275);
  -webkit-transform: scale(1.1) translateY(-50px);
  -moz-transform: scale(1.1) translateY(-50px);
  -ms-transform: scale(1.1) translateY(-50px);
  -o-transform: scale(1.1) translateY(-50px);
  transform: scale(1.1) translateY(-50px);
  opacity: 0;
  visibility: hidden;
  z-index: 20;
  overflow: auto; }
  .nav.nav--open {
    -webkit-transform: scale(1) translateY(0);
    -moz-transform: scale(1) translateY(0);
    -ms-transform: scale(1) translateY(0);
    -o-transform: scale(1) translateY(0);
    transform: scale(1) translateY(0);
    opacity: 1;
    visibility: visible; }

.menu {
  margin: 30px 0 0;
  width: 100%;
  position: relative;
  padding: 30px 0 20px;
  list-style: none; }
  .menu:after {
    content: "";
    display: block;
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    top: 0;
    width: 40%;
    height: 100%;
    background: #fff;
    z-index: -1; }
  .menu li {
    width: 50%;
    margin: 0 0 30px 25%; }
  .menu a {
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 15px;
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    color: #000;
    font-weight: 300; }
  .menu .menu__el--etudiants > a {
    display: none;
    visibility: hidden; }

.submenu {
  padding: 0;
  list-style: none;
  margin: 0; }
  .submenu li {
    width: inherit;
    margin: 0 0 30px 0; }

  padding: 0 0 40px 0;
  list-style: none;
  overflow: hidden;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #c7c7c7;
  width: 80%;

    width: 45%;
    float: left;
    margin-right: 10%; }
    .reseaux li:last-child {
      margin-right: 0; }

    padding-top: 50px;
    color: #949494;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 12px;
    font-size: 1.2rem; }

    background: #fff;

    margin: 0; }

    padding: 0 9.375%; }

    height: 200px;
    width: 100%;
    background: red;
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center; }

    top: 220px; }

    text-decoration: none;
    color: inherit;
    display: block;
    padding: 60px 9.375% 30px;
    position: relative; }

    margin-top: 15px; }
    .actuMore .link:after {
      content: none; }

    position: absolute;
    top: 30px;
    left: 9.375%;

    font-size: 12px;
    font-size: 1.2rem; }
    .actuMore .date:before {
      content: "- "; }

  list-style: none;
  padding: 0;

      content: ", "; }

    content: ""; }

  margin: 0; }

      margin-bottom: 0; }

      left: 0;

      content: "> "; }

  list-style: none;
  padding: 0;

    margin: 0 0 6px 0; }

    display: block; }

  list-style: none;
  padding: 0;
  margin: 15px 0 0 0;
  overflow: hidden; }
  .sidebar__reseaux li {
    float: left;
    margin-right: 15px; }
  .sidebar__reseaux a {
    width: 30px;
    height: 30px;
    text-indent: -9999px;
    display: block;

    background-size: cover; }

    background-image: url(assets/img/icon--twitter02.svg); }
  .sidebar__reseaux li:nth-child(3) a {
    background-image: url(assets/img/icon--google02.svg); }

.sidebar__cat {
  list-style: none;
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0; }
  .sidebar__cat li {
    margin-bottom: 5px; }
  .sidebar__cat a {
    color: #000;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    font-size: 12px;
    font-size: 1.2rem;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-weight: 600; }
    .sidebar__cat a:before {
      content: "- "; }

          -o-transform: translateY(0);
          transform: translateY(0);

          -moz-transition-delay: 0.3s;

    .moreL .moreL__img {
      margin-bottom: 30px; }
  .biocontact a {
    background: url(assets/img/mail.svg) no-repeat left center;
    padding-left: 50px;
    background-size: contain; }
  .pagenumber {
    position: absolute;
    top: 80px;
    right: 0;
    text-align: inherit;
    margin: 0; } }

@media screen and (min-width: 1100px) {
  .menu {
    margin: 0 8% 0 0; }
  .menu li {
    margin: 0 6.976744186% 0 0; } }

@media screen and (min-width: 1200px) {
  .actuMore li:first-child {
    left: 0; }
  .actuMore li:first-child .title__vertical {
    left: 92.833333%; } }

@media screen and (min-width: 1400px) {
  .menu {
    margin: 0 7.1428571429% 0 0; }
  .menu .menu__el--etudiants {
    margin-right: 0; } }

/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*  Table
/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*  Forms
/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
.searchform {
  position: absolute;
  top: 20px;
  left: 9.375%; }
  .searchform .container {
    padding: 0; }

.searchform__input {
  border: none;
  background: none;
  font-size: 12px;
  font-size: 1.2rem; }

@media screen and (min-width: 900px) {
  .searchform {
    position: fixed;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    background: rgba(250, 250, 250, 0.98);
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    z-index: 200;
    visibility: hidden;
    opacity: 0;
    pointer-events: none;
    -webkit-transition: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.175, 0.885, 0.32, 1.275);
    -moz-transition: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.175, 0.885, 0.32, 1.275);
    transition: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.175, 0.885, 0.32, 1.275);
    -webkit-transform: scale(1.1) translateY(-50px);
    -moz-transform: scale(1.1) translateY(-50px);
    -ms-transform: scale(1.1) translateY(-50px);
    -o-transform: scale(1.1) translateY(-50px);
    transform: scale(1.1) translateY(-50px); }
    .searchform.searchform--open {
      visibility: visible;
      opacity: 1;
      pointer-events: inherit;
      -webkit-transform: scale(1) translateY(0);
      -moz-transform: scale(1) translateY(0);
      -ms-transform: scale(1) translateY(0);
      -o-transform: scale(1) translateY(0);
      transform: scale(1) translateY(0); }
    .searchform label {
      font-family: "Source Code Pro", serif;
      font-weight: 700;
      color: #9c9c9c;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      font-size: 18px;
      font-size: 1.8rem; }
    .searchform .container {
      padding-top: 80px; }
    .searchform .searchform__input {
      font-family: Oswald, sans-serif;
      font-weight: 700;
      font-size: 60px;
      font-size: 6rem;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      width: 100%;
      outline: 0;
      position: relative;
      left: -2px;
      top: -10px; }
      .searchform .searchform__input::-webkit-input-placeholder {
        color: #000; }
      .searchform .searchform__input::-moz-placeholder {
        color: #000; }
      .searchform .searchform__input:-moz-placeholder {
        color: #000; }
      .searchform .searchform__input:-ms-input-placeholder {
        color: #000; }
  .btnclosesearch {
    position: absolute;
    top: 40px;
    right: 2%;
    font-size: 14px;
    font-size: 1.4rem;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    font-family: "Source Code Pro", serif;
    font-weight: 700;
    background: url(assets/img/cross.svg) left center no-repeat;
    background-size: 15px;
    padding-left: 25px; }
    .btnclosesearch:active {
      color: #000; } }

/* ==========================================================================
   Print styles.
   Inlined to avoid the additional HTTP request:
   http://www.phpied.com/delay-loading-your-print-css/
   ========================================================================== */
@media print {
  *,
  *:before,
  *:after {
    background: transparent !important;
    color: #000 !important;
    /* Black prints faster:
                                   http://www.sanbeiji.com/archives/953 */
    box-shadow: none !important;
    text-shadow: none !important; }
  a,
  a:visited {
    text-decoration: underline; }
  a[href]:after {
    content: " (" attr(href) ")"; }
  abbr[title]:after {
    content: " (" attr(title) ")"; }
  /*
     * Don't show links that are fragment identifiers,
     * or use the `javascript:` pseudo protocol
     */
  a[href^="#"]:after,
  a[href^="javascript:"]:after {
    content: ""; }
  pre,
  blockquote {
    border: 1px solid #999;
    page-break-inside: avoid; }
  /*
     * Printing Tables:
     * http://css-discuss.incutio.com/wiki/Printing_Tables
     */
  thead {
    display: table-header-group; }
  tr,
  img {
    page-break-inside: avoid; }
  img {
    max-width: 100% !important; }
  p,
  h2,
  h3 {
    orphans: 3;
    widows: 3; }
  h2,
  h3 {
    page-break-after: avoid; } }

/*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
